text: almnafqwn walmunafiqat sinf wahid fi 'ielanhm al'iiman wastbtanhm alkfr, yamurun bialkufr biallah wmesyt rasulih wayanhawn ean al'iiman waltaet, wymskwn 'aydihim ean alnfqt fi sabil allh, nasuu allah fala ydhkrwnh, fanasiahum min rhmth, falam ywfqhm 'iilaa khyr. 'iina almunafiqin hum alkharjwn ean al'iiman biallah wrswlh
